name: deployment
description: This is the automatic deployment system for the server and website. This system automatically listens to webhooks for the `stable` and `nightly` branches. When an update is pushed, it pulls, updates the server `/ServerBuild` and restart. It also zips the game build  `/Build`, names it correctly `(CyberBlitz_Stable_V1.2.zip)` and makes it avalible to download from the website.
